title: Mcdonalds font
content:
I've been looking for this McDonalds font everywhere.. I did lookup on whatfontis.com and it did find some close match but nothing dead on. Also I know that before using this font, McDo old lookalike font was: "Berthold Akzidenz Grotesk"

This one is much more modern.. the capital R, is straight.. looks great. Thx for the help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701130744im_/http:/typophile.com/files/whatsthisfont_4988.jpg)
author: Siffloteux

comments.content:
Hello

there is my suggestions

[Alternate Becker 1 (Regular)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701130744/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=URW&ffam=Alternate%20Becker%201%20-%20Regular&fstyle=&fsize=60&fid=63d706b3ea6fe318a30cd67d7388747a&wrap=2&text=RABAIS)  
 [Interstate Compressed (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701130744/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Interstate%20Compressed/fonts/)

You go it! "Marianina Cn FY Bold" it is  
Perfect match, thank you so much =D

@hasnain125  
Close one my friend, thank you for your time!
